arts.ttl: Will Alexander Isak Play Against Atletico Madrid in Liverpool’s Champions League Opener?
arts.sum: Arne Slot has confirmed that Isak is in the squad for Liverpool’s Champions League opener.

arts.ttl: Liverpool vs. Atletico Madrid: Preview, Prediction and Lineups
arts.sum: Liverpool kick off their Champions League campaign against familiar foes Atlético Madrid.

arts.ttl: Liverpool Predicted Lineup vs. Atletico Madrid: Changes Expected for European Opener
arts.sum: Liverpool and Atléti haven’t locked horns in European competition since 2021.

arts.ttl: "Anfield debut against Atletico": What role will Isak play for the Reds in UCL?
arts.sum: Liverpool will take on Atletico Madrid in the Champions League on Wednesday at Anfield, and fans will hope to see Alexander Isak on the pitch.

arts.ttl: Liverpool includes Isak in squad for Champions League game vs. Atletico Madrid
arts.sum: Liverpool manager Arne Slot confirmed Isak is in the squad for the game at Anfield after not including the striker for Sunday’s 1-0 win over Burnley in the Premier League. Speaking ahead of the game against Atletico, Slot said Isak could play some part.

arts.ttl: Diego Simeone sends 'hurt' Liverpool pledge as he makes emotional Anfield admission
arts.sum: Diego Simeone was speaking at Anfield ahead of his Atletico Madrid side's clash with Liverpool in matchday one of the 2025-26 Champions League

arts.ttl: Liverpool handed Champions League boost as Atletico quintet ruled out injured
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid will be without five injured players for their opening League Phase fixture in the 2025-26 Champions League away against Liverpool on Wednesday night.

arts.ttl: Alexander Isak named in Liverpool squad for Atletico Madrid clash as Arne Slot confirms injury latest
arts.sum: Liverpool’s big money summer signing is in contention to make his debut against Atletico Madrid

arts.ttl: Arne Slot makes decision on Alexander Isak ahead of Liverpool's Champions League clash with Atletico Madrid after £125m man missed Burnley win
arts.sum: The £125million summer signing from Newcastle was left out of Liverpool's squad for their 1-0 victory against Burnley on Sunday, with the Reds citing the need for him to build his fitness.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot confirms Alexander Isak involvement for Atletico Madrid clash
arts.sum: Isak has been working towards match fitness following his £125m arrival from Newcastle
